com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class LookupRecords

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.LookupRecords

  • public class LookupRecords
extends Object
    Lookup record from a record-set or observable list of records.

    Miquel Sas

        Lookup records indicating the selection mode.
